fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Select a player. On the next day, they may send up to 3 messages. On every succeeding day, they may send one less message than they sent the previous day. Soon they will be able to send no messages at ALL. If they send more messages than they were supposed to then they get modkilled and you steal all their abilities too, just for fun. Sending 0 messages when they were supposed to send -1 or smth does not count I guess. **(1 use per night)**.
